mapper.select: SELECT t.tour_code, t.planned_day, t.plan_no, t.tour_name, t.tour_days, t.dep_day, t.ava_rec_max, t.dep_code, d.dep_name, t.arr_code, a.arr_name, ac.accom_code, ac.accom_name, ac.accom_tel, t.base_price, t.conductor, t.tour_abs FROM tourinfo AS t JOIN departure AS d ON t.dep_code = d.dep_code JOIN arrival AS a ON t.arr_code = a.arr_code JOIN accommodation AS ac ON t.accom_code = ac.accom_code WHERE t.tour_code = #{tourCode}
